title.value: Global problems and sustainability of the national food security: in 2 volumes. Vol.1
Глобальные проблемы и устойчивость национальной продовольственной безопасности: в 2 кн. Кн.1

abstract.value: In course of the research the theoretical, methodological and practical aspects of security in the areas of food were studied, trends, patterns and problems of the world food system, their impact on the security of states were identified. The trends and forecast for world agriculture, analysis of the factors, which determinate potential threats and challenges of our time, as well as measures to counter them, were provided. Based on the author's methodology, including the criteria, indicators, metrics, and the algorithm the dynamics of sustainability in the areas of food security, especially its security in the post-crisis period, at the national level were determined. Potential of threats was identified and the measures necessary to prevent their occurrence were justified. There were considered such questions as aspects of food problem solving, the factors of destabilization of the food system, theoretical and methodological aspects of the food safety system formation, method of estimating of the effects of the threat destructive impact to food security in the quality of population life, balance of the functioning of raw materials and food market, especially the formation of the food market, self-direction as a food security strategy, methodological aspects of the food market balance.
